page.title: 09STANBRIDGE EARLS PRIVATE SCH
page.content: There are 176 pupils at the school, 30 of which are girls. The age range is 13_18. There are 28 full time teachers, 10 part time, 15_20 cleaners and 1 gardener. The school was built in the{13th {Century}but there are now some modern buildings such as the boarding house for girls. The name{Stanbridge Earls} comes from the name of the original eatate. Pupils work a full day except for Wednesdays and Saturdays. The main sports available are rugby, hockey and cricket. The charge per term is Â£1790 not including lessons for{Remedial {English}and{Music. } Most pupils come from London and the counties of southern England.
